name: Sisyphus Simulator
description:
Experience Sisyphus' divine punishment in this exciting, action-packed, new game! Endlessly push the boulder to the top of the mountain, only for it to fall back down to the bottom every time.

Features:

  • State-of-the-art Game Boy style graphics and controls!
  • Inspired by the head-canons of Albert Camus!
  • 25+ 'endings'!*
  • Mythologically plausible! 

Made for the Mini Jam 7

*There is no end to your punishment.
